recommended_degree: Pendidikan Matematika, Pendidikan Guru Sekolah Dasar (PGSD), Pendidikan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam (Sarjana)
job_description:
- Assist the teacher in preparing materials, worksheets, and learning tools.
- Support students in understanding lessons and completing exercises.
- Help maintain classroom order during learning activities.
- Collect and organize student assignments as instructed by the teacher.
- Assist in group activities or remedial sessions.
- Perform other relevant tasks assigned by the teacher or academic coordinator.
